page.title: 06AEROPLANES
page.content: On Wednesday I went to the airfield that we thought was disused but as we found out it had some aeroplanes covered up in a hanger. There were also two aeroplanes outside. We thought that the two aeroplanes that were outside were crop sprayers. when we went to the end of the runway we saw a sign that said intensive aircraft movement. There were two chemical lorries there that had a load of chemicals by it. So our maps were wrong when they said that the airfield was disused becaues it is used for crop planes and chemicals.
